name: Game Reporter
tagline: Generate a report about boardgames - typically from boardgamegeek.com
body:
### Welcome to the GameReporter

The **gamereporter** allows you to generate reports for a list of game-like objects - typically boardgames whose data can be sourced from [boardgamegeek](http://www.boardgamegeek.com).

More details and examples to come ... in the meantime, checkout the [project repository](https://github.com/gamesbook/gamereporter/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
